    "name": "Primes of the form (n+1)^n - n.",
    "comment": [
        "Generated by n = 2, 3, 6, 13, 31, 42, 61, ...",
        "The next term (a(7)) has 110 digits. - _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 24 2016"
    ],
    "example": [
        "7 is in this sequence because (2+1)^2 - 2 = 7 and 7 is prime."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Select[Table[(n+1)^n-n,{n,70}],PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 24 2016 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(MAGMA) [a: n in [0..100] | IsPrime(a) where a is (n+1)^n - n];"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A177008."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,less",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Jan 25 2015",
    "references": 0,
